title: Ered Nimrais (4U343)
text:

Site:	4T
Game Text:	Mountain. The twilight cost of each companion and ally played at Ered Nimrais is +3.

Notes:	When Smeagol is played to Ered Nimrais and The Nine Walkers is in play, his twilight cost is 1.
